description: While global economy goes through uncertainty, India has shown tremendous resilience. FDI is at the highest level: PM @narendramodi — PMO India (@PMOIndia) December 5, 2016
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Spoke on 'Hydrocarbons to Fuel the Future – Choices & Challenges' at the inauguration of  #Petrotech2016. Talked about 4 pillars of our vision for India’s energy future- energy access, energy efficiency, energy sustainability and energy security.

Government's Hydrocarbon Exploration and Production Policy has key salient features that will encourage growth & investment in the sector. http://nm-4.com/zx0y
